events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on 2024-05-30, requesting to file an insurance claim for damages sustained during the accident.
The claim was reviewed and classified under 'Auto Accident' due to the involvement of the customer's car in a collision on a public road.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the claim and assist the customer throughout the process by providing guidance and support.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt of all initial information and outlining the next procedural steps clearly.
We requested detailed documents including the police report, vehicle repair estimates, and photographs from the accident scene to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documentation on time, including the official police report and mechanic's damage assessment for vehicle repairs.
The investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted materials and inspecting vehicle condition reports to determine liability and coverage.
Investigation finalized confirming that the claimantâ€™s vehicle was damaged in the collision and that the claim is eligible for coverage under the policy.
A settlement offer was presented to the customer, outlining the amount to be reimbursed for vehicle repairs according to policy terms and damage evaluation.
The customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the transparency and promptness of communication throughout the claim process.
Approval was granted on the claim following acceptance of the settlement terms by the insured party after thorough review.
The agreed settlement amount was transferred to the customer's designated bank account as reimbursement for repair costs.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that all procedures were completed, payments issued, and customer satisfaction ensured.
All claim files and correspondence were archived securely for record-keeping and future reference as required by company policy.
